content:
Localizers

  • Long term goal is coin-sized devices

    • Relative position with centimeter accuracy over kilometer distances
    • Low bandwidth (1-10 kbs) data communications for free

  • Relies on sub-nanosecond synchronization of time signals among localizers

  • Prototypes focusing on single chip implementation

    • Currently two custom chips
    • Pager-sized experimental units
    • Centimeter accuracy over 30 m
    • www.aetherwire.com
